name: Graybeard

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in Dungeons by 30%.

skills.name: Expose Weakness
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Ice Crush
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Bring It On
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. removed.
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
